items.content_html: Smart Dark Mode Extension A lightweight browser extension that intelligently enables dark mode on websites. It automatically detects the website's theme and switches to a dark theme to reduce eye strain and improve readability, especially in low-light environments. Easy to install and customize for a better browsing experience.

Easy to install and customize for a better browsing experience.
